name: Call from Beyond
description:
Hey! We: Tidemor, Portion Pommes and me Percayalah, 

...had a ton of fun when participating in our first ever game jam: the KluJam. Together we planned, designed and developed our game "Call from Beyond".  Tho' we could have gone further, the crunch times were crunchy so the crap code is crappy; Please forgive us.
In the game you control a character who can switch between a demon and human form. Can you keep the balance?

#together a part
 you form a powerful union that even can destroy rocks (INSANE, ISN'T IT?)
#together apart 
every time the demon forms a union with you he will see the possible future of the world... if the demon is stronger than you
